title: conferred on her by section 1(2) of the Charities (Amendment) Act 2024 (No.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Charities (Amendment) Act 2024
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Charities (Amendment) Act 2024 

(Commencement) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited charity (amendment) act 2024 (commencement) order 2025

title: conferred on her by section 1(2) of the Charities (Amendment) Act 2024 (No.
heading: 2. The 27th day of January 2025 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 27th day of January 2025 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Charities (Amendment) Act 2024 (No. 21 of 2024) 
shall come into operation: 

(a) Part 1; 

(b) 

sections 3, 5, 6, 20, 31, 33, 36 37, 39 and 40. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Rural and 
Community Development, 

17 January, 2025. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Rural and Community Development. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 24th January, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [10] 3

ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
